title: Chinese Firms Linked to Silk Typhoon Filed 15+ Patents for Cyber Espionage Tools
description: Chinese companies linked to the state-sponsored hacking group known as Silk Typhoon (aka Hafnium) have been identified as behind over a dozen technology patents, shedding light on the shadowy cyber contracting ecosystem and its offensive capabilities.
